data.text: @John_page85 Hi! if you want to leave your comments or complaints, you can contact our customer care department. You can contact them here: https://t.co/OzrIxYNv63 select "General Complaint or compliment". With kind regards, Jonna.

urls.title: Contact forms

data.text:
@vekstportef Som del av SAS arbete med hållbarhet kommer SAS EuroBonus inte längre att skicka ut fysiska EuroBonus-medlemskort. I stället är ditt medlemskort tillgängligt via SAS App.

Om du fortfarande vill ha ett fysiskt kort kan du logga in på ditt EuroBonus-konto och beställa ett kort.

@thitrieu52 Hi, if you already received a case ID from our Customer Care, please wait till you receive a response. If you already received a response, please respond to the latest email in order to take your claim further.
Kind regards, Rebecka

data.text:
For a fall city break, Florence is one of our favorite destinations. With resumed routes to the city as well as to Amsterdam, Dublin, Krakow and Prague, we will be flying more than 160 direct routes to 90 destinations during the fall✈️💙 

Welcome onboard!
#flysas #florence https://t.co/o1d7snT4PE

@R_A_S_ @R_A_S_ I can't check your case via Twitter due to security rules. So please contact us via Facebook messenger, the live chat or by phone so we can look into it. I would advice you to not write your booking reference on Twitter.
Best regards, Mikael.

data.text:
@flffm @flffm I can't check your booking via Twitter, so if you can't change the seats free of charge you need to call us to arrange that. To add an extra seat between you, please read the information on our website https://t.co/oJuIGfW7og
Best regards, Mikael.

@TLspotting @TLspotting right now we don't have any direct flights in July 2022 between PRG and CPH and I don't have any information that it will change. But I would recommend keeping yourself updated.
Best regards, Mikael.

Kind regards, Anja!

data.text:
@Dr_Mari @Dr_Mari we apologize for any inconvenience. If you wish to check other available options, please call us and we will help you look into it. You can find our numbers and opening hours here https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj by clicking "Customer service/Eurobonus".
Best regards, Mikael.

data.text: Today's flight to Tokyo was a special one for Kim, Flight Pilot on today's service. Onboard the flight was his son, the athlete Daniel Wagner! Together they are now flying to Tokyo and the Paralympic Games. Best of luck to all the Scandinavian teams! 💙 #flysas #japan #tokyo https://t.co/0bRMKUEs2f

data.text:
@omibenenat @omibenenat I would advice you to contact us via phone, the live chat or Facebook messenger. But due to security rules, we can only help with rebooking tickets if you call us.
Best regards, Mikael.

@omibenenat @omibenenat right now you can only bring one carry-on in the cabin. You can read about it here https://t.co/gml5ZaEizi under "Changes to our services". 
Best regards, Mikael.

urls.title: Travel and Service Updates
urls.description: We are Scandinavian by name and nature and our operational priorities are: Safety, Punctuality and Care »

data.text:
@MummzieBird @MummzieBird when you begin the chat with our robot Turi you should get the option: "Chat with Customer Service". That is how you access our live chat. If you don't get that option, please type it instead.
Best regards, Mikael.

@s_lll_b @s_lll_b I can't check cases via Twitter due to security rules. So I would advice you to contact us via Facebook messenger, the live chat or by phone so we can look into it and help you more.
Best regards, Mikael.

@suziecoop01 @suziecoop01 I'm sorry to hear you've had a bad experience with us. I can't check cases or book tickets via Twitter, please call us again if you need assistance with that. If you wish to send a feedback, you can do so via this link: https://t.co/bGG0RxjLun
Best regards, Mikael.

data.text:
@ToitoineD @ToitoineD the online check-in opens 30 hours before departure, if your doc was approved and you still can't check-in within that time, please try again later or proceed to the airport for manual handling. We apologize for any inconvenience.
Best regards, Mikael.
@Tone_BLM Hi! if you are unable to get the boarding pass online you must check in at the airport. Kind regards, Jonna.

data.text: @s_lll_b Hi! At present, there are many customers who want to contact us, which leads to increased queues, we have to apologize for this. For help with rebooking your trip, you must call us and we can help you rebook your trip! All our phone numbers are here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj .

data.text:
@zwirnm Hi! The long haul flight will have food served for both dinner and breakfast. Bag prices can be found here: https://t.co/D2hgbaFHcb call our support to add in advance. If you fly with more airlines than SAS you will need to purchase the bag at the airport. 
Kind regards Rebecka

data.text:
@fatimaalqabandi Hi, I am terribly sorry to hear that your pet was not automatically sorted out. Please contact our Customer Service by phone so that we are able to find an alternative flight if there is no space for your pet on your current flight. https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Kind regards, Rebecka

data.text:
@ElektrikZoo Hi, you can add a vegetarian meal as long as the request is added to your booking no later than 24 hours before the departure. To do this, please contact us on Live Chat, Phone or by Facebook Messenger so we can add it for you. https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj 
Kind regards, Rebecka

data.text: @Dian1506 Hi! To be able to sit next to each other it's best that you book the tickets together. Either you book Go Light and buy a checked bag for one of the tickets. Or you can book Go Smart and one of you can travel without a checked baggage even though it is included in the ticket.

data.text:
@Ste_Forna Hello,
If you have booked two separate bookings and cannot check in online, you will need to check in at the airport.

Alternatively, you can try to check in via both the SAS-app and website, and try with different browsers.

Thank you for contacting us, regards Anja!

data.text:
@SquirtyBerti Hello Mambi
If you have reported the bag missing , usually an SMS is sent when it has arrived at airport and after that contact for delivery happens. Here are phone to ground handling
I hope you receive it soon.
Best regards /Anna

@polisa20 Hi, 

The flights visible on our homepage are scheduled flights that are expected to go as planned.

Regards,
Peter

@brionycdavies Hi Briony,

we can unfortunately not arrange for a colleague on the phone support to call you to add luggage. 

Regards,
Peter

@athenaragna Hi Athena 
No it should not take 2 weeks , I advice you to contact us on messenger and we can help you change phone number by asking some control questions.
We answer the same day or the day after on messenger.

Kind regards /Anna

data.text: @_Matthew_Shaw Hello, if you have paid for the ticket using a voucher and then canceled it for a refund the amount will be refunded back to the original voucher with the same validity as before. Please check your original voucher at https://t.co/ui2Ls6yWKm to see if the amount is restored.

data.text: @xTemerz 1/2 Hi, due to current cabin restrictions only 1 item per passenger is allowed in the cabin. If you can bring the laptop inside the carry-on it is not a problem but a carry-on and laptop seperately may not be accepted by the cabin crew.
